title: We are Leading app
paragraph1: We are proud to introduce one of the most technically advanced and user friendly software for the school management and administration, paperless as well as automation. Our software not only reduces the manual work and administration hassles, but also keeps the goodwill of your institution by maintaining closer relationship with students, teachers, staff and guardians.
paragraph2: We assure you that VidyaCube can save time, cost, and manpower.
name: Kritagya Rana
